For those having issues with DX11 error:
1) Update your videocard drives. 
2) After that go to their website and install beta version drivers on top of that.
3) Instal system updates. I realise that it doesnt sound like it should help, but it does.
4) Reboot
6) At this point my DX11 error changed to Hitman5 has stopped working" ERROR
7) Install steam. Don't have to login or create an account, but have to download and install it. Again, I know that this doesn't sound like it should help but strangely enough it does.
8) Enjoy the game.

For people who do not want that steam shit on our PC, this is how i fixed the "Program stopped working" problem.

For Windows 64 Bit:

1. click start
2. type REGEDIT
3. HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINESOFTWARE-Wow6432Node-Valve-Steam
4. IN THE RIGHT PANEL click NEW
5. click strange value and type InstallPath
6. right click InstallPath and click modify and type C:Program Files (x86)Steam in value data colom
7. IN THE RIGHT PANEL click NEW
8. click strange value and type Language
9. right click LANGUGAE and click modify and type ENGLISH in value data colom

For people with 32 bits:

1. click start
2. type REGEDIT
3. HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINESOFTWARE-Valve-Steam
4. IN THE RIGHT PANEL click NEW
5. click strange value and type InstallPath
6. right click InstallPath and click modify and type C:Program FilesSteam in value data colom
7. IN THE RIGHT PANEL click NEW
8. click strange value and type Language
9. right click LANGUGAE and click modify and type ENGLISH in value data colom

Notes:

1. same procedure if you using other language for you computers not a game language
This language is for INSTALATION procedure for STEAM

2. Keep in mind that others games have stop working but you can fix this eliminating the modifications made in the registry editor for the Transformer game

3. If you dont see the Valve key, you need to create it the key and then create the Steam key

Hope this helps !

Notes:

1. same procedure if you using other language for you computers not a game language
This language is for INSTALATION procedure for STEAM

2. Keep in mind that others games have stop working but you can fix this eliminating the modifications made in the registry editor for the Hitman Absolution game

Hope this helps !

i worked out how to get the game loading properly again.

1)I unistalled steam and reinstalled it.
2)logged into my steam account
3)added the game to the game library as a "non steam game"
4)clicked on play in steam game library

The game loaded up straight away.

This seems to work fine with the exception of a sound problem that sounds like a game problem and not a crack problem.  I have a Soundblaster X-fi Fatality Pro card, and the latest beta driver from over a year ago that they remind you they don't support (sarcastic: thanks awesome product support from creative as usual).  I have sound during the splash screen, intros, menus, loading screens, and the first few seconds of gameplay...then the second I move I hear a "pop".  From then on there's no or almost no sound, with the exception of random horrible static that sounds a bit like someone just tasted the rainbow and a million skittles are falling on their head.  Hitting the forums I found numerous rediculous suggestions as per usual..then found several people that "fixed the problem" by setting their sound channel setting from whatever surround setting they use to stereo 2 channel sound.  This sounds likely, and it's not the first time I've seen a recent game fail to support surround properly for all common hardware (skyrim fails on realtek audio when set to surround...which is probably only used by about 95% of players).  Surround sound made it's way to the PC for gaming, for games much like hitman and skyrim.  It even worked in previous hitman releases just fine.  I'm not going to play this if the only way I can is in stereo...good thing I didn't pay for it.  I also took the time to read a review and the game sounds aweful anyway, doesn't stack up to previous releases.

Response to other posts: yes it works (mostly), no it doesn't contain a virus, no it doesn't ask for a cdkey (unless you didn't copy over the crack perhaps), yes people are seeding...stop fucking posting telling people to seed it's annoying.
